description.value:
A mesmerizing gemstone caps the head of this handsomely crafted wooden staff. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify enchantment magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Daze]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Laughing Fit], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stupefy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Confusion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Suggestion]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wave of Despair]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Never Mind]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
